colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B ZHES DMIGS BRTZE MA'I TSIGS BCAD GCIG LA SKYES BU GSUM GYI LAM RIM, GRUB MTHA' BZHI, SDE SNOD GSUM, THEG PA GSUM, PHAR PHYIN DRUG ,SANGS RGYAS KYI SA'I YON TAN SOGS, MDOR NA CHOS KYI PHUNG PO BRGYAD KHRI BZHI STONG BSDU BA'I TSUL CHA DGU CAN GYI SPYI GTZUG GI YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA DON GRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BLO LA GANG SHAR SHAR DU SMRA BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS TSUL DON DU GNYER BA 'JAM DBYANGS 'PHRIN LAS SO,, ,,
author_simple: DON GRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
